alert.note: Alert for Bitterroot, Sapphire Mountains; Lower Clark Fork Region; Missoula, Bitterroot Valleys; Potomac, Seeley Lake Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 13 at 2:48PM MST until December 15 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM WEDNESDAY TO 8 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches, with isolated higher amounts. * WHERE...Lower Clark Fork Region, Missoula/Bitterroot Valleys, Bitterroot/Sapphire Mountains and Potomac/Seeley Lake Region. * WHEN...From 11 AM Wednesday to 8 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions during the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bitterroot, Sapphire Mountains; Lower Clark Fork Region; Missoula, Bitterroot Valleys; Potomac, Seeley Lake Region
